comments_since_last_sample.body: Never owned it. But would be nice to. 🙏🏻
I’ve heard a lot about adg I would like to try it
I’d like to enter the giveaway. AdG was my very first fragrance purchase and I have some great memories. Haven’t worn it in ages though and no longer own a bottle.
Have been using it since my teen
I'd love to be entered in the giveaway. I never tried this warm fragrance classic Acqua Di Gio only the profumo i tried. Would love to give a try on it if lucky to won.
I've never tried the original, however profumo is one of my signature go tos
I didn't know aqua di gio would work in fall and winter! I have the shower gel and deodorant as well.  I gotta pull it back out the closet.
I would love to get the original ADG back in my collection
I owned it back in my high school days
Artisan pure and doir sauvage is killer
Never worn or even smelled ADG before but I’d love to have it. Would be amazing if I won it thx 🤓
No, I've never worn - not even tried - the original Acqua di Giò!
I've sampled ADG and like it quite a bit, but I've never owned a bottle.  Thanks for entering me in the giveaway.
I've never worn ADG but definitely want to try it out after watching this video !
I’ve rocked it couple of times with ADG. Still a great fragrance today.
back in the day, i Never rocked coz my friends were wearing it😇i’d love to have it now though
ADG was the first fragrance I ever wore, I would spray on some for junior high. I would always take my dad’s bottle lol
I actually never owned a ADG perfume! Lol, weird cause I live in Florida. However, I do love the scent of it!

I agree with the theme of the video. I have used a freshy  in a climate controlled environment and the smell still nice. 
The closest I've had to ADG(I have only tried it) is Armaf Bleu Home. I would like to be entered for the giveaway of the real thing.
Thanks!
I have never worn adg but I've always wanted to try. It checks all the boxes for what I look for in a fragrance. And with winter coming up it would be awesome to give it a try in the colder months!
